{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nest |model=Thermostat |revision=E (A0063) |price=169 |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=08/31/2017 |fcc_id=ZQAT40 |ic_id=9754A-T40 |type=IoT, Thermostat |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6UL;MCIMX6G, 2DVM05AA, CTAR1641, 1N52P, CHINA FOARCTA; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu2_brand=STMicroelectronics |cpu2_model=STM32L431;STM32L, 431VCI6, 7BA2X 9R, PHL 647; |cpu2_cspeed=80 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF4G18AB-XKI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT6TL64M16BI-G0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Cypress |wi1_chip1_model=CYW43340;CYW43340XKUBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=2.4GHz ZigBee/Thread/Bluetooth FEM;Skyworks;SKY66403-11;66403-1, 55305, 1640 MX;1; ,,, SoC Network Co-Processor for ZigBee;Silicon Labs;EM3581;EM3581, 1652A00MQM, TW;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.0 LE, battery backup, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui= }} {{TagLine|Nest Thermostat E}} :{{ProductPage|https://nest.com/thermostats/nest-thermostat-e/overview/}} <!--{{FCC ST|02/26/2018|indexme.}}-->
"© 2017 NEST LABS 001-00188-01 REV 02" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos.
*[http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/9493/teardown-nest-learning-thermostat ''Teardown'' on '''Electronics360'''] <!-- "© 2016 NEST LABS 001-00073-02 REV 02" Major Components: Outer Ring, Machined Stainless Steel *2.08" Diagonal, TFT LCD, a-Si, TN, 480x480, N/T, 17g - :MFR: TIANMA MICRO ELECTRONICS CO LTD - MPN: TM030XDHG30 *Application Processor, 32-Bit, ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz & ARM Cortex-M4 227MHz Core, :64KB / 32KB L1 Cache, 144KB RAM / 96KB ROM, 2x 8-Channel 12-Bit ADC, PCIe 2.0, 40nm - :MFR: NXP SEMICONDUCTORS - MPN: MCIMX6X3EVK10AB *WLAN Module, 802.11b/g/n, Dual-Band 2.4/5GHz, Contain Cypress Semiconductor :CYW43340XKUBG - MFR: MURATA MANUFACTURING CO LTD *SDRAM, Mobile DDR2, 512MB, 533MHz - MFR: MICRON TECHNOLOGY INC - :MPN: EDB4432BAPA-1D-F *Flash, NAND, 512MB, SLC - MFR: CYPRESS SEMICONDUCTOR CORP - :MPN: S34MS04G200BHI000
*Cover Glass, Tempered Glass, Black Color Painted, Convex Glass, w/ Double Adhesive Tape :Analog ICs, 8-Layer, FR4, Lead-Free - MFR: NAN YA PCB CORP, Humidity Sensor -->
